issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Possible sequence deletion in clone FP089514.9, truncating zgc:101710/BC083254.
issue.resolution_text: Component FP089514 has been resubmitted and updated to FP089514.10. The updated trims the submission removing a 25kb deletion occurring in the clone. Overlapping component CR396585.6 contains the missing sequence including the absent 3' end for gene zgc:101710 and is now represented in the reference assembly.

issue.summary: Can unplaced contig NW_001877567.3 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.description: Can unplaced contig NW_001877567.3 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: Unlocalized contig NW_001877567.3 has been added to the chromosome 15 reference TPF placing in the gap between components CU656047.13 and CR388160.19 (ZG-3053)

issue.summary: Can unplaced contig NW_001877583.3 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.description: Can unplaced contig NW_001877583.3 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: Unplaced contig NW_001877583.3 comprising the finished components AL929521.11 and BX897750.11 has been added to the chromosome 15 TPF based on optical map information.

issue.description: Optical map analysis indicates that the contig comprising the components CR954145.20-CR936977.8 localizes to chr15.
issue.resolution_text: The chromosome 8 contig comprising the finished components CR936977.8 and CR954145.20 has been added to the chromosome 15 TPF based on optical map information. In addition finished component CR450822.4 found by blast alignments has been added to the TPF closing the gap between CR954145.20 and FP236470.24.

issue.description: Optical map analysis indicates an incorrect contig order and orientation in the clone path between BX510332.10 and BX927244.11.
issue.resolution_text: The TPF has been reordered and is now consistent with optical mapping data.

issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between components CR944666.14 and BX324136.11
issue.resolution_text: Strand sequencing data indicates that the components of ctg1525 are in an incorrect orientation in the reference assembly. Therefore components CR944666.14 and BX324136.11 are not paired across a gap.

issue.summary: FPC ctg10209 may need to be restored
issue.description: FPC ctg10209 disappeared from zebrafish chromosome 15 when Zv9 was created. This appears to have been an oversight, suggesting that ctg10209 should be restored.
issue.resolution_text: contig ctg10209 has been added to the TPF joining to ctg1513. Component FQ377984.7 shares an overlap with CR626875.10

issue.summary: Can unplaced component FO704637.1 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.description: Can unplaced component FO704637.1 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: Unplaced component FO704637.1 has been localised to chromosome 15 through strand sequencing analysis. End pairs link the component to chromosome 15 Zv9 scaffold Zv9_scaffold2111 placed in the gap ZG-3084

issue.summary: Strand sequencing information indicates components in wrong orientation
issue.description: Strand sequencing information indicates that the overlapping components of ctg1525 are in the wrong orientation in the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: Orientation of components in ctg1525 has been changed in the TPF following analysis of strand sequencing data. This affects the following gap tickets ZG-5581 and ZG-5467

issue.description: Clone CU914486 removed in zv10, not replaced by clone sequence.
issue.resolution_text:
For GRCz10 the sequence previously represented by component CU914486.6 can be found on the following clone and WGS components; CR382327.27, CABZ01086035.1, CABZ01086034.1 and CABZ01086033.1
Details of clones selected for gap closure can be found in tickets ZG-2939 and ZG-2940.
